data.title: South Alabamian
data.text:
Packaging Corp. of America (PCA) plans to launch a three-year, $440 million project to permanently convert a paper machine at its Jackson mill in Clarke County to produce linerboard used for corrugated packaging. Lake Forest, Illinois-based PCA announced that it discontinued the production of uncoated free sheet, used for copy paper and other applications, on its No. 3 paper machine […]

Warrants have been signed for a man in connection with the theft of an automobile and a pickup from Pilger Chrysler in Jackson sometime overnight Jan. 10- 11. The suspect is not in custody. Deputy Jackson Police Chief Richard Harvey said that a Dexter Pearce, of a Georgia address, was arrested in that state. A download of his cell phone […]

The Washington County Public Fishing Lake will reopen on Friday, March 5, after the completion of a restocking project by the Alabama Department of Conservation and Natural Resources’ (ADCNR) Wildlife and Freshwater Fisheries Division (WFF) that began in 2018. The 84-acre lake is located at 809 State Lake Rd., in Millry. During the closure, the lake was restocked with bream, […]

Six former Alabama educators, including two who had stints as coaches in Clarke and Marengo counties, face numerous federal charges of fraudulently inflating enrollment data at virtual schools within a district in order to get larger reimbursements from state education funds. Nearly $7 million in state funds were improperly allocated through the scheme, prosecutors say. Some of the money went […]

Arrests booked through the Clarke County Jail the week of Feb. 23-March 1 include the following: Steven Trace Jordan, 20, driving under the influence, motion to revoke bond, arrested by Clarke County Sheriff’s Dept. Conner David Smith, 30, unlawful possession or receipt of a controlled substance, drug trafficking, drug paraphernalia, use or possession-second offense, arrested by Clarke County Sheriff’s Dept. […]

Marriage Certificates Brittany Latisha Morris, to Janarrian Jai Williams Sr. Kerigan Byrd Ray, to Alden Trice Dunn. Property deeds listed Dated Feb. 18-24 Ledkins Land Co., LLC, to Justin Phillips. Tabatha Ann Thomas, to Larry Willoughby Harrell. Estate of Gerald Pugh, to James Cody Caraway. Molly C. Parham LLC, to Paul H. Parham III. Brian Chapman, to Brian Chapman Jr. […]

Jackson and Antioch fire departments battled this house fire on Hoven Road north of Jackson Tuesday afternoon. The house was fully engulfed when the firemen arrived. Tabitha Odom Harbison said that her family lost everything in the blaze. Two of her children, who were home when the fire erupted, were being monitored at Jackson Medical Center for smoke inhalation. The […]

Weyerhaeuser Company on Feb. 25 announced an agreement to purchase 69,200 acres of high-quality Alabama timberlands from Soterra, a subsidiary of Greif, Inc., for approximately $149 million. The acquisition is comprised of highly productive timberlands situated in southwest Alabama, approximately 100 miles north of Mobile. Acreage is in Clarke County as well as other counties of southwest Alabama. According to […]

Business Hours:

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Friday from 8 a.m. - 4 p.m.

Closed Saturday and Sunday
